x="190" y="123" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-7" value="ViewRootImpl" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="295" y="100" width="140" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-9" value="requestLayout()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="600" y="140" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-11" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">里面有一个</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="123" width="110" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-16" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-12" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-15"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-12" value="checkThread()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="970" y="140" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-14" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">先检查是否在主线程<br>不是的话就抛异常</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="775" y="103" width="190" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-20" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-15" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-15" value="getQueue().postSyncBarrier()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="920" y="320" width="280" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-17" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">检查线程后，接着发送一个同步屏障消息，<br>因为需要优先view的绘制</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="860" y="230" width="370" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-26" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-19" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-25"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-19" value="mChoreographer.postCallback( <font style="font-size: 18px;">绘制Veiw的具体代码 </font>)" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="320" width="380" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-21" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">编舞者干活</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="795" y="303" width="110" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-24" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-22" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-21"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-22" value="<div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 18px; background-color: initial;">编舞者主要是用来配合Vsync，即垂直同步信号，</span></div><font style="font-size: 18px;"><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial;">只有当编舞者收到垂直同步信号时，才会去绘制view，</span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial;">管理帧率；</span></div></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="410" width="460" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-29" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-25" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-28"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-25" value="doFrame()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="35" y="320" width="260" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-27" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">这里主要是去找底层surfaceFlinger请求Vsync，<br>收到信号后，回调到doFrame()</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="250" width="420" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-32" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-28" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-31"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-28" value="doCallback()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="35" y="510" width="260" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-30" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">里面会先对计算帧率，超过30帧会打印log，<br>记录当前这一帧的时间，接着走绘制代码的流程</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="410" width="400" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-41" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-31" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-40"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-31" value="doTraversals()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="35" y="660" width="260" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-33" value="<div style="text-align: left; font-size: 19px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 19px;">里面的run方法，就是刚postCallback传进来的对象，</font></span></div><div style="text-align: left; font-size: 19px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 19px;">也就是绘制view的代码</font></span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-45" y="573" width="470" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-43" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-40" target="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-42"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-40" value="performTraversals()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="390" y="660" width="260" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HCcKmEhZ09kjA1h_IuF4-42" value="measure()、layout()、draw()" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="730" y="660" width="310" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.font:
先检查是否在主线程
不是的话就抛异常

switch.text: 先检查是否在主线程 不是的话就抛异常

div.font:
检查线程后，接着发送一个同步屏障消息，
因为需要优先view的绘制

switch.text: 检查线程后，接着发送一个同步屏障消息， 因为需要优先view的绘制

div.span: 编舞者主要是用来配合Vsync，即垂直同步信号，

div.style: text-align: left;
div.span: 只有当编舞者收到垂直同步信号时，才会去绘制view，

div.style: text-align: left;

switch.text: 编舞者主要是用来配合Vsync，即垂直同步信号，只有当编舞者收到垂直同步信号时，才会去绘制view，...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 245px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 257px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
这里主要是去找底层surfaceFlinger请求Vsync，
收到信号后，回调到doFrame()

switch.text: 这里主要是去找底层surfaceFlinger请求Vsync，...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 435px; margin-left: 81px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
里面会先对计算帧率，超过30帧会打印log，
记录当前这一帧的时间，接着走绘制代码的流程

switch.text: 里面会先对计算帧率，超过30帧会打印log，...
